rangerSkills.name: Double shot
rangerSkills.description: A popular bar trick practiced by rangers. Fires two arrows at a time with somewhat less precision

rangerSkills.name: Set Trap
rangerSkills.description: Sometimes a ranger doesn't need a bow to punish their enemies

rangerSkills.name: Camouflage
rangerSkills.description: Sneaking up on a deer is hard. Sneaking up on a knight? Simple.
